title: ERP Capability Definitions
description: Schema for defining ERP capabilities and adapter profiles

generatedCapabilitiesNamespace.description: The namespace for generated capability classes

generatedInterfacesNamespace.description: The namespace for generated interface definitions

capabilities.description: List of all possible ERP capabilities

name.description: The unique name of the capability (e.g., 'Vendor.CanRead'). Interface name will be derived as 'I' + name with dots removed (e.g., 'IVendorCanRead')

description.description: Human-readable description of what this capability does

adapterProfiles.description: List of ERP adapter profiles that specify which capabilities they support

name.description: The name of the adapter profile (e.g., 'ViewpointVista')

targetNamespace.description: The namespace where the adapter class will be generated

targetClassName.description: The name of the adapter class that will be generated

supportedCapabilities.description: List of capability names that this adapter supports

items.description: Name of a capability defined in the capabilities array
